snippet: The state comptroller and treasurer want to merge their jobs. The Senate has agreed to let voters decide, but the bill is stalled in the House.
lead_paragraph: The state comptroller and treasurer want to merge their jobs. The Senate has agreed to let voters decide, but the bill is stalled in the House.

headline.seo: Illinois Voters May Vote Whether to Merge Treasurer and Comptroller Jobs
headline.main: Move to Allow Vote to Merge Treasurer and Comptroller Jobs Stalls in House
headline.print_headline: Move to Allow Vote to Merge Treasurer and Comptroller Jobs Stalls in House
